descriptionHtml:
[url=https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3932/15537028782_dcf7d3d2cf_z.jpg][img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3932/15537028782_dcf7d3d2cf_z.jpg[/img][/url]
AVA is a standalone follower, meaning you don't need any other mods to install him.
AVA can be found in the Bannered Mare, in Whiterun.
He is a Ikemener, preferring axes or blunt one/two-handed weapons.
[color=#00ffff][size=3]
[/size][/color][color=#00ffff]Recommended Mods[/color]
